Uses of Package
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics

Packages that use de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
de.nec.nle.siafu.control With the exepction of the GUI class, this package contains all the controlling classes. 
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package. 
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running. 
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.simulationarea This package contains the classes that draw the simulation area, that is, the Canvas where the agents live and thrive. 
de.nec.nle.siafu.model This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects. 
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics used by de.nec.nle.siafu.control
GUI
          The GUI class implements the simulator Graphical User Interface.
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics used by de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
GUI
          The GUI class implements the simulator Graphical User Interface.
Markers
          Instances of this class encapsulate the marks in the simulator.
Markers.Type
          This class represents the types of tracks available in the simulator.
Overlayable
          Classes implementing this interface contain a bidimensional array that can be drawn on top of the background map, and has its same dimensions.
Sprite
          A sprite is an object that contains the images for an Agent simulation, as he faces each possible direction.
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics used by de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel
GUI
          The GUI class implements the simulator Graphical User Interface.
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics used by de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.simulationarea
GUI
          The GUI class implements the simulator Graphical User Interface.
Markers
          Instances of this class encapsulate the marks in the simulator.
Painter
          This class handles the actual drawing on the simulation's canvas for most of the simulator's graphics.
 

Classes in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics used by de.nec.nle.siafu.model
Overlayable
          Classes implementing this interface contain a bidimensional array that can be drawn on top of the background map, and has its same dimensions.
